shortDescription: A routine sweep of the planet's surface revealed something unexpected: a power signature coming from the location of an abandoned facility. From the readings we're getting, it could be a 'Mech factory powering up. We're not in a good strategic position to claim the factory, so we need you to find it and destroy it. If we act quickly, we can deal with this before any 'Mechs are produced. If you do come across any newly produced 'Mechs, of course, you should reduce them to scrap as well.
longDescription: Depending on what's being produced there, this could be trivial or terrifying. I wish I could be more specific, but our employers don't even know who we're fighting.

contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy Factory and Extract Safely
contractObjectiveList.description: Destroy Enemy Structures and Extract Safely

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Factory
objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy the targeted buildings.

objectiveList.title: Destroy Factory Defenders
objectiveList.description: The primary objective to destroy the garrison / defenders of the base.

objectiveList.title: Destroy Enemy Reinforcements
objectiveList.description: The objective to eliminate enemy reinforcements who attack.

objectiveList.title: Get to the evac zone
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to extract their units.

dialogueContent.words: Okay, folks, I've spotted another DropShip in the area, with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} markings. So now we know who we're fighting.
Yang, what's your read on that factory? Are they building 'Mechs?
Those look like Orion parts. One sec... Nah, it's only partially powered up. Another few days, though, and this battle woulda been a lot harder.
Well then, Commander, you know what to do. When you're done, Meyer will be on station to pick you up from this LZ.
Damn, I hate to see all that hardware turned to scrap. Imagine if we could have gotten a half-dozen of those Orions working.
Yeah, I'm imagining getting shot by them. Commander, let's go home.
Dammit. I just hope they can't get that factory powered all the way up. Let's debrief back in orbit, Commander.
They've got multiple units protecting this facility, careful not to get caught in an ambush.
We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
